author: Jessie Dean Altman
title: Jimmy Kimmel Brings Us A New Edition Of Mean Tweets For The Oscars. | Someecards TV
text:
The 89th annual Academy Awards contained a new clip of Jimmy Kimmel's beloved Celebrities Read Mean Texts, Oscars edition . You can watch it via the Hollywood Reporter tweet. Ryan Gosling, Emma Stone, Natalie Portman and more star in Mean Tweets: #Oscars edition. pic.twitter.com/5NHHvxuT3D — Hollywood Reporter (@THR) February 27, 2017 Advertising 
Here are some of the funniest Mean Tweets, Oscars edition, volume two. 1. Emma Stone "Emma Stone looks like a crack whore in every role she plays." 2. Ryan Gosling "Oh, look at me…I'm Ryan Gosling, I have perfect bone structure and kind yes. Go **** yourself Ryan Gosling." 3. Tilda Swinton "Now's probably a good time to remind everyone about this dog that looks like Tilda Swinton." 4. Jessica Chastain "I'm going to white balance my TV on Jessica Chastain's chest. #Oscars Advertising "Samuel L. Jackson has resting fart face…" © Copyright 2017 Someecards, Inc.
